name: prutill
description: Promise utilities to improve multiple Promise processing.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist_commonjs/* dist_es6/* && tsc --project tsconfig-commonjs.json && tsc --project tsconfig-es6.json && npm run rename-cjs && npm run minify
scripts.rename-cjs: for f in dist_commonjs/*.js; do mv "$f" "${f%.js}.cjs"; done
scripts.minify: for file in $(find dist_commonjs -name '*.cjs' dist_es6 -name '*.js'); do terser "$file" -c -m --source-map "content='${file}.map',url='$(basename ${file}).map'" -o "$file"; done
scripts.test:
npm run lint:all && jest && jest -c jest-node.config.json && command -v deno >/dev/null 2>&1 && deno test --config tsconfig-deno.json || echo '
ℹ️  [33mDeno is not installed. Skipping Deno tests.[0m'
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run lint:md && npm run format
